title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. 450 of 2020)) of the Child Care Act 1991 (No.
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Child Care Act 1991 (Early
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Child Care Act 1991 (Early 

Years Services) (Amendment) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations shall come into operation on 1 September 2023. 

Interpretation
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited child care act 1991 (early year services) (amendment) regulation 2023 (2) regulation shall come operation 1 september 2023 interpretation

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. 450 of 2020)) of the Child Care Act 1991 (No.
heading: In these Regulations:
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations: 

“Principal Regulations” means the Child Care Act 1991 (Early Years Services) 
Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 221 of 2016) as amended by the Child Care Act 1991 
(Early Years Services) (Amendment) Regulations 2016 (S.I. No. 632 of 2016), 
the Child Care Act 1991 (Early Years Services) (Amendment) Regulations 2021 
(S.I. No. 401 of 2021) and the Child Care Act 1991 (Early Years Services) 
(Amendment) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 195 of 2022). 

Amendment of Regulation 9 of the Principal Regulations
text_norm: 2 regulation principal regulation mean child care act 1991 (early year services) regulation 2016 (s.i no 221 2016) amended child care act 1991 (early year services) (amendment) regulation 2016 (s.i no 632 2016) child care act 1991 (early year services) (amendment) regulation 2021 (s.i no 401 2021) child care act 1991 (early year services) (amendment) regulation 2022 (s.i no 195 2022) amendment regulation 9 principal regulation

title: Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. 450 of 2020)) of the Child Care Act 1991 (No.
heading: 3. Regulation 9 of the Principal Regulations is amended –
text_raw:
3. Regulation 9 of the Principal Regulations is amended – 

(a) 

in paragraph (4), by substitution of “, (6B) and (6C)” for “and 
(6B)”. 

(b) By inserting after paragraph (6B) the following paragraph: 

“(6C) Furthermore, paragraph (4) shall not apply before 1 
September 2026 to a childminder who- 

(a) was previously exempted under paragraph (6B) 

and 

(b) is in possession of a letter from the Minister 
confirming that paragraph (4) shall not apply to him or her 
before that date. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 28th July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 [387] 3 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Minister for Children, 
Equality, Disability, Integration and Youth, 

25 July, 2023. 

RODERIC O’GORMAN, 

Minister for Children, Equality, Disability, Integration and 
Youth. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [387]
